name: Area: data
description: data, data models

name: Area: design
description: visual design, branding, identity

name: Area: ux
description: end-user experience, interaction

name: PR: DO-NOT-MERGE
description: This pull request is not ready to be merged

name: PR: good-to-merge
description: This pull request is ready to be merged, code is accepted

name: PR: on-hold
description: This pull request is on hold - not ready for merge

name: PR: review-needed
description: This pull request should receive review by at least one other member in the team

name: PR: work-in-progress
description: This pull request is still being worked on - not ready for merge

name: Priority: Critical
description: The issue causes data loss, crashes or hangs salt processes, makes the system unresponsive, etc.

name: Priority: High
description: The issue reports incorrect functionality, bad functionality, a confusing user experience, etc.

name: Priority: Low
description: This issue can probably be picked up by anyone looking to contribute to the project, as an entry fix

name: Priority: Medium
description: The issue reports cosmetic items, formatting, spelling, colors, etc.

name: Status: blocked
description: There is another issue that needs to be resolved first or some external blocker.

name: Status: cant-reproduce
description: The issue is a bug and has been reviewed, but cannot be reproduced.

name: Status: duplicate
description: This issue or pull request already exists.

name: Status: info-needed
description: The issue needs more information before it can be verified and resolved.

name: Status: in-progress
description: This issue is being worked on, and has someone assigned.

name: Status: invalid
description: This doesn't seem right

name: Status: on-hold
description: Similar to blocked, but are unable to process the issue at this time

name: Status: wont-fix
description: The issue is legitimate, but it is not something the team is currently able or willing to

name: Type: bug
description: The issue documents broken, incorrect, or confusing behavior.

name: Type: completed
description: The issue has been completed

name: Type: discussion
description: Further discussion or changes of confusing or incongruous behavior or documentation.

name: Type: documentation
description: Improvements or additions to documentation.

name: Type: enhancement
description: The issue is a new feature or a change to a feature which enhances the project.

name: Type: feature
description: The issue is a request for new functionality including changes, enhancements, refactors, etc.

name: Type: help-wanted
description: Extra attention is needed

name: Type: maintenance
description: Updating phrasing or wording to make things clearer or removing ambiguity, without changing the fun

name: Type: question
description: Further information is requested
